info:
HOME: 0-4
BYPASS-1: NO SLOT
ADJ-1: 226-236 (231)
ADJ-2: 293-303 (298)
ADJ-3: 359-369 (364)
ADJ-4: 426-436 (431)

HOME: 660-670



HOME to ADJ-1 = 231
ADJ-1 to ADJ-2 = 67
ADJ-2 to ADJ-3 = 67
ADJ-3 to ADJ-4 = 67
ADJ-4 to BYPASS-2 = 27
BYPASS-2 to HOME = 212

STEPPER MOTOR 360 ROTATION = 667 COUNTS
